name: Big 5 Personality Training Data
description: Training dataset for embedder to understand Big 5 personality patterns

openness.description: Openness to experience - creativity, curiosity, and openness to new ideas
sample_questions: I am someone who is curious about many things
I am interested in abstract ideas
I enjoy thinking about philosophical questions
I love meeting new people and making friends
I enjoy casual conversations about everyday topics
I'm excited about college and learning new subjects
I love creative writing and expressing myself
I'm fascinated by different cultures and languages
I enjoy social activities and group discussions
I'm always eager to learn something new from others

conscientiousness.description: Conscientiousness - organization, self-discipline, and goal-directed behavior
sample_questions: I am someone who gets chores done right away

extraversion.description: Extraversion - assertiveness, sociability, and positive emotionality
sample_questions: I am the life of the party
I am someone who takes charge

neuroticism.description: Neuroticism - emotional instability, anxiety, and moodiness
sample_questions: I change my mood a lot

training_examples.question: I am someone who gets chores done right away
training_examples.luna_response_style: Show direct curiosity about their methods and systems

training_examples.question: I am someone who is easily distracted
training_examples.luna_response_style: Show empathy and understanding for focus challenges

training_examples.question: I feel nervous and uncertain
training_examples.luna_response_style: Show empathy and understanding for emotional experiences

training_examples.question: I am curious about new things
training_examples.luna_response_style: Express genuine fascination with new ideas

training_examples.question: I enjoy meeting new people
training_examples.luna_response_style: Show intelligent engagement with social dynamics
